name: Life of a Student
description:
Life Of A Student- Story of Keshav 

This is a small text-based narrative game about an Indian boy who goes abroad to complete his education. His entire story is recorded by him on his diary.  

It starts with you getting stuck in a  remote village in the state of Rajasthan, India and how you come across the diary of Keshav. Read through the book to find out how was his education and life abroad.

Note- Sound and music credits: https://freesound.org/home/
